text: Brookthorpe is a village in Gloucestershire, England. == History == The name "Brookthorpe" means 'Brook outlying hamlet'. Brookthorpe was recorded in the Domesday Book as Brostorp. ==See also== *St Swithun's Church, Brookthorpe ==References== ==External links== * Stroud Voices (Brookthorpe filter) - oral history site Category:Villages in Gloucestershire Category:Stroud District
title: Brookthorpe
